item.title: Search Log Files Using PowerShell
item.description: You’re troubleshooting an application and need to look through the logs to find out what is happening. We’ve all been there, right?

item.title: Using the Terminal for Basic Network Troubleshooting
item.description: Introduction Network troubleshooting is a necessary and valuable capability for any IT professional from helpdesk technician to veteran network engineer. In this blog post we will take a look at some basic commands you can use from your terminal (specifically in a Windows environment).

item.title: Working with CSV and XLSX in PowerShell
item.description: Introduction PowerShell is a powerful scripting language that can automate a wide variety of tasks. common activity that IT professionals need to perform is working with data files such as CSV and XLSX files, both of which are typically associated with Microsoft Excel or other workbook/worksheet applications.
